211140.name: 真・三國無雙６ with 猛將傳
211140.description:
Conquest knows no boundaries.

Experience the thrill of taking on entire armies as one of many playable warriors from the Wei, Wu, Shu and Jin Dynasties. Lead your squad to victory in the face of insurmountable odds, as you realize your dream of reuniting ancient China.

Please note this item is only available through retail in package form in Taiwan and Hong Kong and not available as a download.

Key Features

Experience both Dynasty Warriors 7 and Dynasty Warriors 7: Xtreme Legends in one game!

  • The addition of the “Jin” kingdom! Experience the rise and fall of heroes in Story Mode!
  • A new generation of heroes and heroines join the roster for a total of 65 characters, the most ever in the DYNASTY WARRIORS series!
  • Coordinate between two equipped weapons! The Switch Attack unleashes a wide range of new and exciting actions.
  • Ultimate weapons! Reliable allies! Satisfying game play for hours on end in Conquest Mode.
  • Gain Secret Weapons when stages are cleared! Enjoy the development of your Castle Town in Legend Mode.
